插件已完全汉化


更新日志（英文）：


v2.6.0


Fixed: Reported valid bugs.
Fixed: NullPointer if specified entity wasn't valid
Added: Config auto-updater (In testing! Be careful!)
Added: EntityRange / Entity simplify / Entity arsenal
This also fixes the bug with entities not spawning with the correct bow/swords
Added: Smarter entity finder - Not case sensitive anymore
Added: ChunkLimiter (NOT working with 1.6.4 atm, don't use)
Added: Entity age checker (Removes old entities)





v2.5.2












Re-coded custom mob spawnerCMS: Set to spawn by ticks instead of a loopCMS: Support for nether, and endCleaned up killmobs cmdRemove Deprecated code
v2.5.1













Fixed not removing entities in some worldsFixed removing occupied boats and minecarts
v2.5.0












Updated to craftbukkit 1.6.2Fixed a few bugsRecoded majority of the pluginAdded Mob Disguise support (Not tested!)Added TNT-Minecart reducerAdded mobspawning engine (Spawn mobs without all that lagg!)Added option to disable squids!Added per cleartype id filter


PS:祝各位游戏愉快！{:10_492:}


说一下：有人说1.7.2版本的汉化用不了，我修复了，现在大家可以下载了！
